name: 90s shoebox: keep it or throw it away
name_original: 90s shoebox: keep it or throw it away
description:
Welcome! I’m glad that you could make it.  My name is Christoffer Lundberg and I have been having trouble for quite some time actually. 

I still got a lot of stuff from when I was a kid and can’t really decide what to keep and what to throw away.  The reason I have postponed the task so long is because a lot of the objects are emotionally charged, and I'm having trouble making up my mind about it. 

That's where you come in. I tried to describe each object as detailed as possible and I will take your decision, even if I might disagree with it, as the final call.  Let me know when you're done with all of the 20 items. And thanks again for helping me out with this, it means the world to me :) 

  • Click on Keep or Throw to display the first item. 
  • I also included an approximation of the volume required to store all the items you decide to keep.
  • If you change your mind about an object, click on one of the icons at the bottom to redo your decision.

Music
